name: splunk-spl-to-sql
description: Convert Splunk SPL to ClickHouse SQL with pegjs

scripts.build: node_modules/pegjs/bin/pegjs --format umd --export-var splToSqlConverter -o lib/converter.js lib/splunk.pegjs && gulp && npm run test
scripts.prepublish: npm run-script build && npm run test

author: wangfucheng <wangfucheng@machloop.com>
